channel.title: Redis on YING ZHEN LI
channel.description: Recent content in Redis on YING ZHEN LI

item.title: Redis
item.description: Commands redis-cli # Local redis-cli -h host -p port -a password # Run Commands on the Remote Server redis-cli INFO memory Data Types Strings Lists Hashes Sets Sorted Sets Strings # SET first "First Key value" GET first # EXPIRE command adds an expiration time (in seconds) to a given key. EXPIRE first 10 # TTL (Time To Live) command returns the amount of seconds a given key has left to live.
